short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a "data-theme" attribute to the body tag of any page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a "data-theme" attribute to the body tag of any page
This allow to quickly check if a theme is working even if the feature isn't fully implemented yet
